answers.answer: Hello crasy_legs,It seems you are having some kind of peripheral neuropathy. Do you smoke cigarettes? Any similar history in the past? Is it increasing with the duration and the distance of the walk?I would recommend take some mineral and nutrition supplement like omega 6 fatty acids and multi vitamin combinations. Do you also suffer from diabetes? If yes when did you last get your blood sugars done? How much have it has been?Answers to these questions would further help.Best,Take care

question: I am a healthy 38yr old whenever I walk about a mile or more I get this burning & itching sensation in my legs, what is it and how do I cure it
title: burning legs
